```{r}
#load the necessary packages
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(devtools)

```

```{r}
#We have to install the PharmacoGx package in order to gain access to the data
if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("PharmacoGx")
```

```{r}
#these are the data contained in the gCSI pharmacogenomic dataset
gr_metrics <- vroom::vroom("gCSI_GRdata_v1.3.tsv/data/gCSI_GRmetrics_v1.3.tsv")
gr_metrics
```

```{r}
colnames(gr_metrics)
```
